properties.areaDesc: Cherokee, OK; Mayes, OK; Muskogee, OK; Wagoner, OK
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 10 at 12:54PM CST until January 10 at 1:45PM CST by NWS Tulsa OK
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Southeastern Mayes County in northeastern Oklahoma...
Eastern Wagoner County in northeastern Oklahoma...
Northwestern Cherokee County in east central Oklahoma...
Northeastern Muskogee County in east central Oklahoma...

* Until 145 PM CST.

* At 1253 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from 2 miles northeast of Porter to 4 miles southeast of
Taft to 4 miles west of Oktaha, moving northeast at 55 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations in or near the path include...
Muskogee...                       Wagoner...
Fort Gibson...                    Locust Grove...
Salina...                         Okay...
Hulbert...                        Porter...
Oktaha...                         Taft...
Tullahassee...                    Hoot Owl...
Peggs...                          Spavinaw State Park...
Sequoyah State Park...            Sportsmen Acres Community...
Wainwright...                     Summit...
Mazie...                          Snowdale State Park...
properties.instruction:
For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.
